website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for the avid Fingerlings collector or for youngsters who just love dinosaurs.
pros: Features T-Rex, one of the latest and most popular members of the Fingerlings family
Kids love the bright colors and snapping jaws
Comes in several character and color combinations
cons: A few reports of duds that didn't perform as expected or that came with dead batteries
Some adults find the roar sounds annoying, but kids don't seem to mind

customer_reviews.title: Creepy little finger lizard.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid and I would swear that when he wasn't looking it scuttled across the floor all by itself. I'm writing this review while standing on a chair because I can hear tiny little dinosaur roars coming from under the table. Help.......
customer_reviews.author: Chuckd76

customer_reviews.title: Well made and super cute
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved these dinos, they are super cute and well made, however the batteries ran out within hours after opening. Is this what is suppose to happen? Thought they should have lasted a bit longer. Had to buy batteries for these immediately, cost $23.00. Could have sent it back but couldn't get it away from the child without lots of tears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dino and interactive
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Jurassic Park and this toy was perfect. Cute interaction when you pet it and small enough she can take with us in the car or going to stores so she loves that. So far no issues with battery, but we do turn the switch off when not in use to save battery life. Exactly as shown and packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Scared son bad. First day it only did 2 sounds and later that day ended up glitching and making demonic repeat sound.
customer_reviews.author: We.make.seven

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves this T-Rex.
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson loves this T-Rex. He has played with this T-Rex for hours and hours at a time. Best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Actually never heard of these until my 4 year old son ask for one. We received today and he absolutely loves it it works fine and very cute. Will order more would make as a good gift for kids who love dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynalyn Nakagawa

customer_reviews.title: Another missed Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: These were the rave, everyone wanted one including my 9 year old. She loved it for an hour and I haven't seen her play with it since. Quality is good and it did everything it was supposed to which unfortunately just was not much for the price. It makes some sounds and movements but it's always the same. There is no "training" or "learning". You just touch it in certain spots and it does what it does. The rating is based solely on my kids interest. It is a quality product, I just wouldn't pay that much for it again.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't play with much
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for 2.5 and 5 year old grandsons. They both love dinosaurs. They each played with this a few minutes, and put it down. They haven't shown any interest in it after those first few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Patcake

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t order again.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my 5 year old son for Christmas. Worked sluggishly for about 2 minutes, then never worked again. It didn’t do anything that the instructions said it would. What a disappointment on Christmas morning. I’m assuming the battery was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Tx. Cowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Dino toy when they work.
customer_reviews.text: Update 12-29-18 Within 3 days after Christmas, we’re down to 2 of 4 working properly. It’s not the batteries because they still make sound. They just keep making a cough like sound over and over. I ordered 4 of these for my boys. Three of them work great and they’re are really enjoying them. One of them doesn’t work most of the time though. I would think it was the batteries needed replaced. But the one occasionally works. Other than that, they are a great small toy for younger boys especially if they are into dinosaurs. It helps that they’ve seen them on toylabtv on YouTube to know some of the things to try to make them do.
customer_reviews.author: Shin03

customer_reviews.title: not as fun as expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, fit on finger is fun to carry around. Makes neat sounds. Described as multiple ways to interact but in reality it is a growling finger puppet. If your kid wants it bc they love dinos, go for it. If your kid is into the interaction with epets.....not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toy for dinosaur lovers
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased by my 8 year old dinosaur obsessed son with his birthday gift card. He loves it and is even sleeping with it. He was able to read instructions on how to play with it by himself. He has had a ball with it, It seems well made and shipping was extra fast.
customer_reviews.author: AMoon

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He saw them in the store and of course I found a better price on Amazon. This toy is super cute and small. He doesn't play with it as often as I thought, but he is in to dino's and loves it. It's a great alternative to the monkey.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Cheap knock off you cannot tame. Doesnt do half of what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bday gift for my son..he loved it but I glitches and stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. The monkey or dragon fingerlings work much better.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t impressed .. the batteries don’t stay in place so it has issues with making noise that repeats .. terrible design.. was disappointed got it for my son for Christmas and it’s cute , but not functional . Should have sent back . Didn’t have package anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi35

customer_reviews.title: Raptor Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this four stars because I received a raptor and not the blue T-Rex I ordered as a gift. Other than that, it looks great. Can’t speak to how it works/lasts though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: I would only get for a REAL Dino loving kiddo. My nephew and son loved at first but then got bored with them quickly. I put them on my finger and talk more than they do. I am a Dino loving kid at heart.
customer_reviews.author: mercurey06

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. She likes it because it makes noises and she thinks it's alive. She said that she can calm it down. She had the monkey but prefers playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vallejo

customer_reviews.title: A hit with a 4 yr old
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at a birthday party. It's pretty interactive, and has an on off switch when you don't want to hear it! :+}
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these as stocking stuffers and extra gifts for kids that pop up over during the holidays and they loved them. This is best suited for children under 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! Actually all my daughters love it. The batteries last and it’s very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey wood

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves this. However, he has already broken a piece off it. Would like to see it a bit more sturdy in the arms and legs areas.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bollinger

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Gran daughter loves this as she collects fingerlings. This one is unique...T-Rex
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not really pleased with this toy. The batteries didn’t last long. It’s kinda boring in my opinion. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my son. The dinosaur doesn’t work and I can’t put new batteries in it because on of the screws is stripped. His head moves and he sounds like a skipping record. Does not do what enclosed instructions say. I would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Batteries die very quickly and doesn’t always do what you command it to. Not impressed with their directions or how it works
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W

customer_reviews.title: Roarrr.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay toy. It does what it is supposed to do. It hangs out on your finger and growls. Not much other then that. It is a good quality and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use gave them as gifts so the kids really enjoyed them..
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rainier

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 my kids absolutely love them!!! They are adorable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Two days and it was in the bottom of the toy box. These are not for kids who don't have the patience to train it.
customer_reviews.author: Forlornmyth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: grandson will love this ..as he is always making growling noises.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are included, but may need to be changed to do all
customer_reviews.text: We had to change the batteries to get it to do a few commands, but it works great right out of the box. My son has namednit his number 1 favorite toy ever.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia13

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This fingerling Christmas gift was a big hit for my 7 and 4 year old grandsons. It is a fun toy that kept them busy while traveling!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my grand daughter who LOVES dinosaurs and she has 2 now and loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: DAUGHTER LOVES THIS TOY!
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and interactive and not too loud. I hate any toy that makes a sound but this one is not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B

customer_reviews.title: Great dinosaur toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son bought this with his birthday money. He is big into dinosaurs. He loves it and it goes everywhere with him. It has lots of cute sounds and ways to interact.
customer_reviews.author: Mancare

customer_reviews.title: Batteries die fast
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these but they eat batteries. They batteries died the first day, we bought more and those died within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew and his smile said it all. He enjoyed playing with it and all the sounds it made.
customer_reviews.author: NairGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive toys but short battery life
customer_reviews.text: Great toy that's interactive and fun to play with. Only downfall is battery life is only a few days
customer_reviews.author: Computertastic

customer_reviews.title: Collecting toys
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are collecting them we have 7 so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lizabeth Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Boring toys
customer_reviews.text: They are not very fun toys and done do much. My boys were not impressed with their capabilities and all they do is sit on your finger and make noise. They are pretty boring toys, good for about five seconds
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cowman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what my granddaughter wanted
customer_reviews.text: Cute as it can be and exactly what my granddaughter wanted. No cons. Priced right, brand new and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Down South

customer_reviews.title: Growls only
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old is into dinousars. I was expecting this to be like the monkey with more noises but it only growls. My 3 year old likes it though.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: It’s really neat dinosaur. The fingerling growls and makes chirping noise.

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old really liked the monkeys but got teased by friends about them ...
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old really liked the monkeys but got teased by friends about them being "girly". He really enjoys this toy.
customer_reviews.author: ebanzhaf

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The toy worked for 10 minutes. Replaced batteries and it still doesn't work.

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra batteries!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for grandson; daughter states he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customisep

customer_reviews.title: battery replacement
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace the batteries after two weeks of use. I could not remove the old batteries; they were stuck in the battery compartment. I found that to be very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DavDun

customer_reviews.title: Huge Hit
customer_reviews.text: My twelve teen grandson absolutely loved this especially when Jarasic park was mentioned. Big hit!

customer_reviews.title: hit for sure
customer_reviews.text: my 10 year old granddaughter loved it. It was her favorite gift.
customer_reviews.author: sumnergrandma

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and it worked for one day. I ordered new batteries and still not working. Wanted to send it back but missed return deadline. I bought one for my other grandson and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Servies

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Xmas for daughter didn’t work she’s so upset

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces and nephews LOVE these things. Came as expected, no damage, worked perfect! No complaints!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Great condition brand new

customer_reviews.title: He loves dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my four-year-old grandson and he loved it

customer_reviews.title: What fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great quality purchase-lots if fun! Quick service too!!!

customer_reviews.title: Kis’s love dinosaurs 🦖🦖🦖🦖

customer_reviews.text: these are so cute and work well both my sons enjoy theirs

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son picked this out to spend his own money on. He absolutely loves it!!! It’s small enough to take with us as a travel toy and keeps him entertained. He talks to it like a real pet. The colors are great! Will definitely buy more!!!

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, it was exactly the "blue t-rex" he wanted. The sounds can be a little annoying, but anything that makes noise can be.

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandson
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my grandson. I'm sure he will love it.

customer_reviews.text: My grandson was in luv with this never put it down. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Dino fingerlings great for even 3 year old!!!
customer_reviews.text: My great grandson has all of the dino fingerlings.... He plays with them every day

customer_reviews.title: BROKE THE FIRST DAY!
customer_reviews.text: Something came loose in the circuitry, we can hear it rattling around. POS that broke my boy's heart.

customer_reviews.text: Very cute, bigger than it looks. It is a gift for my grandson. I actually got several of these. The colors are vivid and detailed.

product_meta.title: Untamed T-Rex by Fingerlings - Ironjaw (Blue) - Interactive Collectible Dinosaur - By WowWee
product_meta.description: Meet the Untamed T-Rex's by Fingerlings! These finger-gripping creatures are fierce and unpredictable, and know friends vs. foes. In untamed mode, they roar, hiss and chomp! In tame mode they nuzzle, purr and love to be near you. Complete with snapping jaws and gripping claws, these interactive dinos react to touch, motion, and sound with over 40 different sounds and animations. Your ferocious T-Rex will also greet you with a unique greeting call when you power him on.
feature_bullets: Ironjaw's the name and I eat metal for breakfast!
Reacts to sound, motion, and touch
Wild roars, chomping jaws, and even a little dino gas
Grips onto your finger and fiercely loyal
Bring your UNTAMED creatures to life and train your army with the NEW UNTAMED Battle Arena app
Batteries included; Additional colors sold separately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars649 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
